channel.title: The-Killer
channel.description:
[center]Well to be frank this will be my last server project :S well here is the server features[/center]
[center]Server Features[/center] [center]Cooking [ x ] Fletching [ x ] (both using loops) Farming (45 mins per tree 4 tree spots to grow on) Firemaking (muti) Woodcutting Mining Crafting (full interfaces uses loops) [/center]
[center]Site Features[/center] [center]Server Status geting added Hiscores :o Server cp (basicly can control the server tho the site ) And arcade[/center]
[center]Client Features New items lol Resized head icons And alot more Hopfuly get a dragable client :) and resized game play
on the site atm we are looking for forum and server staff can you please pm me or stumeo on the site
[/center]

item.title: The-Killer
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You can’t post a non-approved link ANYWHERE.
Other mods may let it slide, I don’t. Get your link approved, or don’t post it, sig it, or type it anywhere on the website.
(Just wanted to make the rule clear :))

Read full topic
